analyzed: anumajjana lakkhaṇaḥ mahā rāja vicāraḥ ti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kaṁsathālaṁ ākoṭitaṁ pacchā anuravati anusandahati, yathā, mahārāja, ākoṭanā, evaṁ vitakko daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kasathālam ākoṭitam pacchā anuravati anusandahati yathā mahā rāja ākoṭanā evam vitakkaḥ daṭṭhabbo
yathā anuravanā evam vicāraḥ daṭṭhabbo ti
